name: Need for Speed: Heat - McLaren F1 Black Market Delivery
description:
The McLaren F1 Black Market Delivery pack was made available for purchase on March 3, 2019, alongside the release of the March Update.

Purchasing the pack will add a pickup location for the player to collect and unlock the McLaren F1 '93 through the Black Market. It will also unlock a series of Black Market Challenges for that car, which will unlock additional customisation items upon the completion of each contract.

name: By Lamplight
description: By Lamplight is a turn-based dungeon crawler where you must climb to the 13th floor of the Demonic Spire. As you climb, you must manage the oil supply for your lantern as well as your own health and sanity. Lighting Torches can help stave off the grip of insanity but will cost you some of your ever-dwindling supply of oil. Will you conserve oil to keep your lantern lit or will you save your sanity and attempt to ward off the horrors of the spire?

name: Battle Bouncers
description: A breakout-RPG mix where you level up and equip heroes before leading them into battle against blocks and enemies that scroll down the screen and you have to take down before they reach the bottom, by bouncing your attacks.

name: Super Bernie World
description: Join Bernie's movement and transform the United States in this free retro 2D platformer.

name: Horizon's Gate
description: Voyage into the wide world of Eral as an explorer, trader, or privateer. Defeat your enemies on land or at sea in deep but straightforward tactical combat. Unravel the secrets behind Dominio's betrayal – or sail off in search of your own adventure.

name: The Horrorscope
description: You will answer a series of questions that will reveal your potential fate. These questions may make you uncomfortable, but with great knowledge comes great sacrifice. Can you make it all the way through The Horrorscope, and if you do, are you sure you want the answers you seek?

name: Axegend
description: Axegend VR is a Roguelike strategic action adventure game. You will play as a versatile knight who will gives his all to save the princess. Anything could become a weapon in his hands: umbrella, tires, boomerang, axe, tube, even...

name: Rest House 2: The Wizard
description: The Wizard is adventure game based on the Edgar Alan Poe works. Through a fogy night you'll need to sail, solve mystery explore secret structures and atmosphere. Explore region and places and find the way out. Beware of enemies!

name: The Escaper
description: 3D escape room game with realtime graphics and physics-based puzzles.

name: Bubberknuckles
description: Punch your way through the cosmos.

name: Art of Boxing
description: Art of Boxing, is a brand new 3D physics boxing video game coming to PC and MAC in 2020! Currently in development for PC and Mac - with Steam Early Access coming early 2020!

name: Gods of Love: An Otome Visual Novel
description: The healer Thalia has developed magical powers and the gods of her world think she might be a new goddess they can marry. Poor Thalia just wants to do her work!

name: Naruto x Boruto: Ninja Tribes
description:
Naruto x Boruto: Ninja Tribes is based on the popular Naruto and Boruto anime series and brings together fan-favorite characters spanning multiple generations of both franchises for one-tap team-based battles.

A turn-based RPG being developed by Bandai Namco, now planned for release on the Enza platform in Japan which includes PC and Mobile web browsers as well as standalone apps for iOS and Android.

Original planned for release in 2018 as Naruto x Boruto: Borutical Generations, the game was delayed and eventually re-announced under a new title, Project: Tri, on May 15th 2019.

name: Victorian Admirals: Marianas Incident 1887
description: Alternate history naval combat strategy game.

name: Victorian Admirals: Panama Crisis 1885
description: Alternate history naval combat strategy game.

name: Victorian Admirals: Caroline Crisis 1885
description: Alternate history naval combat strategy game.

name: Victorian Admirals: Samoan Crisis 1889
description: Alternate history naval combat strategy game.

name: Stickman Warriors
description:
This fighting game will give you a chance to become one of super heroes to fight with enemies and protect everybody on earth. Enter into the arena and fight for the survival. If you love playing games then this is the game which will amaze you with the swift handling and amazing features.

With addictive gameplay fighters, your enemies will upgrade their power and you have to fight for survival. To fight against the most Boss likes Ninja Black, Big Thunder lizards..., the shadow stick fighter may need to upgrade your power to the highest level. We bet you will enjoy the abundant upgrades for and all your stickman heroes in the best action RPG fighting game.

name: The Halloween Party
description: Sin descripción

name: Match Me If You Can
description:
A crime has been committed.

The killer is hidden in a pub where a speed-dating event is taking place.

Infiltrate the event undercover, casually question the suspects, connect the dots, and arrest the murderer... Unless love turns up to mess with your plans...

name: Undertale Together
description: A co-op mod of Undertale, with this mod you will be able to play the entire game with two players.

name: R'lyeh Assault
description: Experience hot blinking action, in a brand new LOVECRAFTIAN TALE of uncanny terror! Destroy the All-Mighty CTHULHU, using the powers of the LEGENDARY NECRONOMICON , and free the fishing town of R'LYEH of his power and his DAGON minions. Will you save R'LYEH from CTHULU'S betentacled grasp, or will you lose your sanity in the process?

name: That Smiling Game
description:
What can we eliminate from our life to make it better?

A short point-and-click game.

name: Badminton Manager
description:
Badminton is the fastest racquet sport in the world, but by playing Badminton Manager you can become a global champion from the comfort of your sofa! Start your journey by playing friendly matches against local opponents, earn money to train your player to improve their skills, and then enter tournaments around the world to win trophies.
Simple menus mean that anyone can start enjoying their path to glory straight away - it doesn't matter if you're a casual player or an experienced badminton pro!

name: Discover My Body
description:
In the year 2040, human beings look for increasingly strange solutions in hopes of finding connection and community.

This is a very short game.

name: Res Furtiva
description: Res Furtiva is a roguelike rpg made by a small creator.

name: Maze Slider
description: Maze Slider is an ice slide puzzle game where players need to slide their way to the level exit. This game is inspired by the ice slide puzzles that can be found in Pokemon. But this game expands on the idea with all new mechanics.

name: Bunny Quest
description: Help desperate daddy bunny fix an Easter mess in the match3 game "Bunny Quest"! Enjoy over 90 Match-3 levels and loads of cute mini games!

name: Atgtha in Absurdia
description: Venture into the Halls of Absurdia to find the Amulet of Yelt'neb in this stylish minimal roguelike!

name: Mine Dungeon
description: A Minesweeper game with a cute character, the control like a action game, and there have barrier objects and enemies.

name: Pendula Swing: The Complete Journey
description: Explore a memorable 1920s fantasy world where you interact, befriend and romance hundreds of characters with unique quests, as an already rich and famous heroine.

name: Dininho Adventures
description: Help out Dininho in what might be the most heroic adventure of your life! Only someone truly evil would be cold to the point of stealing eggs from a defenseless dinossaur mom, and dininho can't let that be. Explore this colorfull and dangerous world, rescuing all the defenseless babies.

name: Donkey Kong On The Run
description: Sin descripción

name: Timestop Volleyball
description: You are competing against world class beach volleyball players. Normally you wouldn't stand a chance, but luckily you possess a mysterious power to stop time - for everybody else except you.

name: Tiny-DDug
description: A clone of Dig Dug for the Arduboy.

name: Chex Quest 4: Flemmed to The Core
description: A modification of Chex Quest 3 that adds a new episode.

name: Comfy Cozy
description:
Comfy Cozy is a mod that adds multiple new decorational blocks with the goal of making your Minecraft sessions more "cozy."

That of course, is a subjective term so your results may vary, but my hope is that everyone can find something they like here.

name: Book Hunter
description: Find rare books in the haunted infinite Library

name: Réel Futur
description: This package contains two games for the price of one.

name: Bigwig Flint
description: Bigwig Flint is a challenging, thrilling, and hilarious top down shooter. A soulfully crafted game with emphasis on perfect classic retro gameplay. Waldemar, the circumcised square, must fight against Bigwig Flint and his many allies. At stake is not only the Universe, but also your sanity.

name: Night of the Consumers
description: It's your first day on the job and the store is closing in a matter on minutes. The consumers, with their unrelenting thirst for customer service are still prowling the aisles and there are shelves still to be stocked up. The store needs to be kept in pristine condition, and empty shelves will not be tolerated by The Manager. Welcome to hell.

name: Factory Rally Madness
description: Factory Rally Madness mixes real time action racing with puzzles and reasoning, inspired by robot programming. Robots race through factories trying to reach objectives points, having their movements programmed while racing. Chaotic, crazy, casual and also not so casual gaming.

name: Rain Island
description: Rain Island is a one small hold & Gun, boss Rush mini-game of Casual difficulty.

name: Starters Orders Classic Horse Racing
description: Starters Orders Classic is a new horse racing management game that simulates owning, breeding and racing your own string around the globe. Based on the highly acclaimed Starters Orders 7 simulation engine Starters Orders Classic features a retro 2D race sequence for both flat and jumps racing!

name: Blind Battle Championship
description: Take your weapons, join your friends and put on your blindfold to participate in the most spectacular battles of the kingdom! Smash your enemies thanks to your skills and intuition to reach victory. You'll never see anything like this!

name: Star Seeker
description: Star Seeker is a puzzle RPG and training card game!

name: Colorful3D II
description: If you love creativity, builders and stackable bricks. You're bound to love Colorful3D II. This original 3D game introduces a completely free space where players are able to build whatever they wish while unleashing their imagination.

name: OneJump
description: OneJump is a minimalistic highscore based jump game. The clue: you only have one chance to jump.

name: Xylith
description: In the vast subterranean world of Eldriss recently discovered monoliths are fueling more than just the humans fears. Sent by Nimbus you must investigate the mysterious Xylith and use any means necessary to quell an alien uprising.

name: People
description: People is a game where you control an island and the native population of people as an omnipotent being. Build towns, complete quests, puzzles, and help your people thrive!

name: Star Goddess
description: Save 9 different goddesses from the evil Star Goddess, and defeat her corrupt empire!!! In this addictive shmup you have to strip the goddesses to save them, from the waves of incoming evil ships.

name: Boris and the Dark Survival: The Wolf Trials
description: Sin descripción

name: Quest for the Crystal Skulls
description:
Quest for the Crystal Skulls is a new action-packed episode for Heretic.
Corvus is confronted by a Heresiarch, a powerful minion of the Serpent Riders. This dark wizard has stolen three crystal skulls, using their power to open a portal to the underworld in the hopes of bringing about his master's return.
Corvus must collect the remaining six crystal skulls in order to unlock the celestial path and confront the Heresiarch before it's too late.

name: Cyber Soldier
description: Fast-paced competitive online multiplayer and offline survival mode, guns and overpowered skills, you and getting cash!

name: Black Mesa: Definitive Edition
description: Black Mesa: Definitive Edition includes performance improvements with a higher frame rate in some levels and visual upgrades, as well as all new and expanded Xen levels.

name: Another_World
description: a Silent Hill/P.T. inspired psychological horror game made with Unreal Engine 4.

name: ElectriarCode
description: 3D fully automatic AI action from Electriar Labo in Japan.

name: Soccer Rally
description:
Soccer Rally is intense car football action on mobile, with a dose of tactics and strategy.
Unlock skills and cars to get ahead of the pack. To get good you will need timing, defense and striking.

name: Wanderzone
description: Jam to a chaotic tune and get lost in bizarre terrain.

name: Rettend: File 1
description: A text based adventure game. In Rettend - File #1 you will solve puzzles and collect photographs.

name: Darq: The Tower
description: Lloyd is back to explore the mysterious tower filled with new puzzles and creepiness. Playing this DLC does not require finishing the game.

name: Choco Pixel 3
description: Choco Pixel 3 is a minimalist colorful puzzle which goal is to get the toy car to the finish using 4 directions in space and avoiding traps.

name: Milya[broken]
description:
"Milya[broken]" is a wondrous adventure game that explores a world that is aesthetic, decadent, and inexplicable and ugly.

The player launches "Milya[broken].exe" and uses the scattered data to find out her identity.
A lot of the data is corrupted, so sometimes you have to unravel the gimmick.

Please come and meet her. I'm sure she'll be happy about that.

name: Vicious Gambling Agreement
description: Vicious Gambling Agreement,Dark and fantastic style,The difficulty has a degree of challenge,evil open punishing system to players in the fighting.It is subject to relying on weapons and fighting with many BOSS many times and then approaching to evil step by step and challenge the world governed by evil.

name: Harry Potter Puzzles & Spells
description: Represent your Hogwarts house and celebrate the magic and enchantment of Harry Potter like never before! Prepare to master spells, outsmart challenges, and explore the wonders of the Wizarding World while becoming enchanted by the most marvelous matching puzzles ever found on your mobile and other devices!

name: Mystery Investigations 1 I Noir Chronicles: City of Crime + Path of Sin: Greed
description:
Path Of Sin: Greed
- Enjoy over 39 mysterious locations!
- Challenge yourself with 36 riddles and hidden object puzzles!

Noir Chronicles: City of Crime
- Explore more than 43 locations in a vibrant metropolis!
- Solve 41 puzzles to get to the real kingpin!

name: Sheep with Mates
description:
Grab some mates and throw them on the couch, it's time to herd some sheep! 
 
Competitive sheepherding for 2-8 local players. 
Fast-paced sheepherding action! 
 
Pick a team, red vs. blue, then get as many sheep as you can back into your stable. 
 
Input is simple and straightforward; a thumbstick to move and a button to bark. Bark at the sheep to scare them away from you, straight into your team's stable. Though beware, because barking scares away all sheep in a radius, even those behind you. 
Play with up to 8 players at the same time. 
 
You read that right! Play with 2 to 8 players at the same time. Teams have no restrictions, so go wild! 
Don't have 8 controllers? That's fine, Sheep with Mates supports 2 players per controller and 4 on keyboard! So you can hand half of your controller to a friend to play. Hand it to a foe for some extra fun!

name: Watch Dogs: Legion - Limited Edition
description:
Pre-order to get access to the Golden King Pack and set your heroes apart in the streets of London with: 
The Uneasy Lies mask, Serpent Sisters Pistol skin & Lux Car skin 
Give the recruits of your resistance a unique look thanks to the Limited Edition 
Physical content, copy of the Watch Dogs Legion game 
Digital content, The London Dissident Pack: unlock three new masks to lead your resistance with style

name: PUBG Mobile: Season 12
description: 2gether we play in Royal Pass Season 12!

name: Broken Signal
description: A chaotic grimy shooter in a procedurally-generated radio tower!

name: Triangle Wing XXXX
description: A STG game. To prove your strength to the strange sound, you must defeat your campanions who have fought together with you.

name: Speed Sweeper
description: Speed Sweeper is a competitive minesweeper speedrunner!

name: Mindframe: The Secret Design - Collector's Edition
description: Could you survive a deadly game where your opponent knew your secrets?

name: You are next
description: "You are next" is a murder mystery for Virtual Reality. Gather your detective instinct and identify the killer!

name: Breeder: Homegrown - Director's Cut
description:
Breeder Homegrown is a short horror game about a family dealing with a strange creature over several generations. You will encounter some puzzles but the game relies mostly on atmosphere, music and dialogues.

The whole experience takes about 40-90 minutes depending on how much you want to explore.

This is the «Director's Cut» version of Breeder Homegrown. Dialogues have been streamlined, some issues have been fixed and if you look close enough, you might find some new little surprises.

name: Vilundia
description: Play as either the Forces Of Chaos or the Forces Of Order to take control of the Kngdom Of Vilundia.

name: Frontline: Panzer Blitzkrieg!
description: Fight your way through 30 WW2 battles - Aim your targets carefully, counter-attack and strategically coordinate your Squads. The study of enemy tactics and the use of Special abilities will lead to victory!

name: Pizza Master VR
description: Pizza Master VR is a fast paced pizza making game. Play in local co-op mode with a waiter, or by yourself in single player. Please customers with drinks and pizzas made from 8 core ingredients. With warm visuals, arcade style gameplay and intuitive controls, who knew pizza making could be so fun?

name: Teddy Bear Wars
description: Teddy Bear Wars is a Multiplayer shooting game with elements of hide and seek. Call your friends and come and have fun in this incredible battle!

name: Summoners Mist
description: Summon the enemies you kill to solve puzzles, including a horse, a tree, a miner and a dragon. Some areas are unreachable without the right summon so you must find out how to get one it to advance to the next area.

name: Quarter Horse Racing
description: Spend a day at the races - Quarter Horse races.

name: Summon Masks
description: A Shaman gives life to Masks just to play with them. Take a side and show to the Shaman which is the best Mask.

name: Beautiful Girl Fight School
description: This is a beautiful girl fighting game. Players control characters to fight with beautiful girls and experience various interesting stories in the Academy. It's a game that you can't miss for those who like the role of beautiful girl or the fighting game!

name: Polygon
description: Polygon is a dynamic multiplayer team first-person shooter. You have to battle on large-scale maps using various weapons with up to 32 players. Properly managing your existing arsenal and skills, you have to lead your team to victory!

name: Sono
description: Sono is a 2D exploration game where players effortlessly glide through an abstract microcosm collecting lost fragments of sound.

name: Mýrdalssandur, Iceland
description: Experience a realistically inspired recreation of iceland's southern coast. Take photos and explore the world at your own pace, become immsersed with some of the latest visual tech provided by Unreal Engine 4.

name: You Are A Bird
description: You Are A Bird is an immersive VR Bird Flight Simulator where your real arms become wings. Flap and angle your wings to explore and hunt in VR. Based on real bird flight mechanics and soaring flight physics.

name: Railway Construction Simulator
description: Experience the realistic everyday life of a track construction company with the Railway Construction Simulator. As a prospective track construction specialist, you will experience exciting and diversified deployments at various track construction sites.

name: Test Tube Titans
description: Grow procedurally generated monsters in a lab and then send them out into the world to create havoc using physics-based controls. That's the basic idea behind Test Tube Titans.

name: Empty Universe
description: This is a First-person sci-fi game based in a spaceship. You are to go around killing a certain number of enemy drones (depending on the level). The higher the level, the more drones you have to kill. There is also survival mode, where you are basically trying to survive for an amount of time while being "shot-at" by multiple...

name: Maiden and Swordsman
description: Hang up, Sleep, Attack Slag Man!

name: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Rescue Team DX
description:
You can meet and recruit Pokémon in a dungeon-crawling adventure within their world! Build a rescue team to take on mysterious, changing dungeons and strategically plan your moves as you venture forth to make the Pokémon world a safer place…and uncover your true purpose along the way.

As you recruit Pokémon, these trusty teammates will need somewhere to stay, so build camps to house, manage, and strengthen your Pokémon friends. Think hard about who is right for the job and how to approach each mysterious dungeon as you prepare a rescue team. You’ll move a single square at a time or use Auto mode to speed up movement until you engage other Pokémon in turn-based battles—but don’t forget about Pokémon strengths and weaknesses! This version adds gorgeous watercolor-inspired graphics, and more! Get comfortable in being a Pokémon, there’s a lot of work to do.

name: Bullet League
description: BULLET LEAGUE is now an integral part of the Super Champs Universe! Brace yourselves for a gravity-defying journey where Super Champ armies clash in an epic multiplayer battle royale hosted by the iconic Super Champs Academy. Simple controls, unique and fun chibi character art-style to win your hearts.

name: Yes, Your Grace
description: In this kingdom management RPG, petitioners will arrive in the throne room each turn to ask for your advice and assistance. Decide whether to help them with their problems, or to conserve resources for more important matters. Remember: supplies are limited, and not everyone has the kingdom’s best interests at heart...

name: Smart City Plan
description:
Smart City Plan is a modern city builder game: Plan zones, roads, public transport like trains, trams, buses, subways and even the hypertube. Set taxes and policies and implement smart city technologies. Generate a sustainable city and take care of your citizens.

Start by creating a few roads and specify zones where your citizens can start building their homes, shops and companies. Once everything runs fine, your can start expanding your city. Extend it by providing public transport for your citizens and implement policies. Ensure everything is taken care for: Pollution, noise, crime, waste, water, energy and so on. Your assistant will help you by guiding your through the process of doing all this easily.

The game is running in real-time, but can be accelerated and paused at any time. Manage policies, track financial data, analyze problems in your city. Expand the city when you have figured out how everything works and manage the public transport system, and build new infrastructure buildings, stations, rails, hypertube tracks, bridges, or even space ports.

name: Deep Space Battle Simulator
description: Two teams of players control their capital ship in an epic battle. Customize your ship, control its movement, weapons and energy distribution or hop into a smaller fighter to show off your dogfighting skills or board the enemy ship to fight its crew and sabotage their ship!

name: Beat Champion
description: Beat Champion is a VR rhythm game that challenges you in ways unlike other VR rhythm games before it. Musical notes are represented by 4 colors, and notes can come at you from multiple directions.

name: Troubleshooter
description:
Troubleshooter is a top-down arcade shooter. Fight through endless waves of unsuspecting dinosaurs and prove you are the best! 
Grab a friend and rampage together. Use meteors showers and upgrades to your advantage.

name: Black Mesa
description: Black Mesa is a re-envisioning of Valve Software's classic science fiction first person shooter, Half-Life. Powered by Source Engine, You will re-visit the inaugural role of Gordon Freeman and his memorable journey through the Black Mesa Research Facility. Expect detailed environments to explore, a huge cast of characters and experimental weaponry. All-new music, voice acting, choreography and added dialogue give way to a more expansive and immersive experience than ever before.

name: Minion Masters: Zealous Inferno
description:
Zealous Inferno is the Faction Box for starting or expanding your Empyrean faction collection. This is a great +300% value bundle of Empyrean cards, including the stalwart commander Caeleth Dawnhammer (Legendary!) and 2 exclusive Empyrean cosmetics.

Includes the new season card - Brother of the Burning Fist!

Includes:
- 3x Caeleth Dawnhammer (Legendary)
- 5x Sun Burn (Supreme)
- 20x Banner Man
- 40x Brother of the Burning Fist
- 40x Legionnaires
- 5x Power Tokens (Get 5 extra random surprises)
- 1x exclusive Legendary Empyrean Avatar - Animated!
- 1x exclusive Legendary Empyrean Emote - Animated!

The Empyrean Army keeps the enemy on the defensive with a strong blend of tough infantry and big minions to soak up damage. Take advantage of the Empyrean Army keyword that boosts your cards for playing multiple Empyrean cards. Use your Caeleth and Brother of the Burning Fist to lead your army and follow up with a group of Legionnaires, then put down a Bannerman to protect your Minions, and lastly, finish off with Sun Burn to send your army into a zealous rage!

name: Fieldwork
description: A Text-Adventure about you in a forest

name: FM4X
description: FM4X is a four-part mod by Fernando Márquez that was created for Duke Nukem 3D: Atomic Edition. Released over the course of 16 years from 2004-2020, each of the four installments replaces one of the episodes from the base game.

name: Occult Secrets of the Third Reich on Mars
description: Occult Secrets of the Third Reich on Mars is the 21st limit-removing project from the inglorious bastards themselves: the Doomer Boards Krew. Featuring nine maps of outrageous soon-to-be-banned-in-Germany action, not to mention possibly the most sector swastikas ever assembled in a single WAD file, OSotTRoM is a timely reminder that the only good Nazi demon is a dead Nazi demon. On Mars.

name: Ghost and Joker: A thing to do for you
description: A visual novel included in the Story Me app.

name: Otoshu DX
description: This expanded sequel of Sound Shooting!! features all of the original game's songs along with new songs and updated gameplay. Like the original game, this blends sidescrolling arcade shooting and rhythm gameplay; this time, the rhythm game sections feature extra lanes for added difficulty.

name: Pact
description: Pact is a turn-based strategy roguelike. Make a pact with a demon for world changing powers and survive the consequences.

name: Side Swap
description: Sin descripción

name: Scrabble Go
description: Welcome to Scrabble Go, the new and updated version of the world’s favorite word game!

name: Another Prince: A Lost Tale
description:
Another Prince ~A Lost Tale~ is a visual novel featuring various figures from common fairy tales like Cinderella, the Little Mermaid, and Alice in Wonderland. Dive into this sweet, heartrending story while you seek to discover the mystery of the “vampire’s blood”!

The princes suffer from a blood curse and have been turned into vampires. Your blood, however, holds a special power… What sort of heart-pounding situations might you end up in?

name: Thine Cometh
description: Sin descripción

name: Fire Pro Wrestling World: World Wonder Ring Stardom Collaboration Part 2
description: Stardom, Japan's leading women's professional wrestling promotion, are back with 11 new wrestlers, including their signature moves, costumes, entrance themes, and voices!

name: Rescue HQ: The Tycoon - Coastguard
description: Protect your city from the dangers of water. In the Rescue HQ DLC - Coastguard, you have the opportunity to protect the citizens of your city not only on land, but now also on the water and master a wide variety of missions.

name: Murder by Numbers: Collector's Edition
description:
The Murder by Numbers Collector's Edition bundle includes:

- Murder by Numbers.
- 30 track original soundtrack by Masakazu Sugimori.
- 60-page artbook PDF containing character concepts, work in progress designs and behind the scenes info.
- 3 exclusive Murder by Numbers wallpapers and bonus art.

name: Hex of Steel
description: Hex of Steel is a WWII solo and online cross-platform (Mac, Linux, Windows, iOS, Android) wargame that covers all fronts and countries.

name: Covid-19
description: Sin descripción

name: War Tortoise 2
description:
You are the pilot of a War Tortoise, one of nature's great battle tanks!

Explore a vast world while you take aim and unleash devastating firepower on hordes of enemies. Develop your own playstyle and play either active, or idle. Unlock dozens of pilots and heroes. Evolve your Tortoise and support units with a huge list of abilities. Relax and fish, and collect a huge variety of different fish. It's up to you to bring back peace to the land!

name: Puzzle: Lines and Knots
description: Logical puzzle game for meditation. The goal of the player is to assemble a puzzle consisting of nodes. Easy to understand mechanics, swap hexagons with lines.

name: DP.T: Dr Pepper Terror
description:
You play as Little Billy, a kid who is staying with his Pappy over the summer and the man is crazy addicted to Dr. Pepper. So much so that he drinks himself into amnesia and forgets he has had any in the last 30+ years so he's constantly asking Billy to go fetch him some more from the store. Today, however, was different. Today, he asked Little Billy to get a case of Dr. Pepper from THE SHED. OooOOoo spooky. No really, the shed is crazy scary. Good luck, have fun. Gameplay is 30+ minutes depending on how much you explore.

There are two endings. One of which is pretty elusive. You'll have to big-brain think outside-of-the-box to figure it out.

This game is a parody of Dr. Pepper and Silent Hills P.T.

name: Train Sim World 2020: Collector's Edition
description: Train Sim World is an immersive first-person simulator perfect for everyone, with complete in-cab interactivity, accurate detail on locos, real-world routes and hours of gameplay. Take to the rails with the brand-new Train Sim World 2020: Collector's Edition and find everything you need to master new skills.

name: Train Sim World 2020
description: Train Sim World is an immersive first-person simulator perfect for everyone, with complete in-cab interactivity, accurate detail on locos, real-world routes and hours of gameplay. Take to the rails with the brand-new Train Sim World 2020 Edition and find everything you need to master new skills.

name: Mindkeeper: The Lurking Fear
description:
Put yourself in the shoes of investigator H. Joyce as you explore a mansion deep in the Swamp of Storms and reveal the secret of the lurking fear. 
 
 
Mindkeeper: The Lurking Fear is an atmospheric video game of puzzles and mysteries inspired by the stories of H.P. Lovecraft. 
 
 
In Mindkeeper you will be able to discover worship, legends and lost realities of multi-tentacular beings that only exist in the abyss of the human mind.

name: Dragon Fight VR
description: We created an internal experiment to see how a short, single level, visceral dragon fight could work in VR. We think it came out pretty cool! So we released it for free. Please enjoy.

name: Ultimate MMA
description: Ultimate MMA is a mixed martial art fighting game. Fight in the tournament, unlock new moves, create unique fighters and play with friends.

name: Arcade Archives: P.O.W. - Prisoners of War
description: Arcade Archives: P.O.W. - Prisoners of War is port of the action game P.O.W. - Prisoners of War. Break free from the POW camp and try to escape from the enemy base by reaching the rescue helicopter waiting in the final area. In addition to the various melee attacks carried out depending on the button combination, you can also pick up weapons dropped by enemies and use them as your own! Experience an intense jailbreak!

name: Great British Railway Journeys
description: Take to the rails and start your own adventure driving iconic trains on real-world routes in the official game of Great British Railway Journeys.

name: Fatal Wings
description: Fatal wings is a classic top down space shoot ‘em. Playing as the last resistance fighters from the similian colony in planet Lithios against a brutal attack led by vernor’s...

name: Champions of Thora
description: Embark on a journey as the four chosen champions of the Goddess Thora, in an ultimate fight against her son, Ganga. The Evil Lord who seeks to destroy the world as everyone knows it to create one anew. Only you stand in his way!

name: JumPlose
description: Test your thinking speed in this platform game inspired by the 90s, do you think you can win?

name: Sugar Shock
description: One-minute match-3 mayhem! Swap colorful candy and climb the real-time scoreboard against people from all over the world.

name: Die Wolf
description: Die Wolf is a low-poly casual archery game. You'll enter a warm, cute cartoon-like space, but you'll have to go through intense battles to defeat the wolves. Become an archer, defend yourself with the pigs from the wolves and set a record to compete with users around the world.

name: Space Bear
description: Space Bear is a multi-choice text adventure typing game! Sort of. I mean, there isn't many actual choices, and the typing is more "mashing"...

name: The Soul Stone War
description: Become the Wielder of Soul Stone, an ancient artifact of untold power, and shape the fate of your world. Outrun the past so that you may have a future.

name: Withstand: Survival
description: Play as journalist who arrived to unknown island to reveal all the mysteries and find information about secret government experiments. Explore beautiful and dangerous open world. Try to survive, fight enemies, craft new objects and complete quests to reveal what happened.

name: Walking Simulator
description: You are Delivery Bot 1, tasked to get parcels from point A to B in the most barren and desolate places on earth.

name: MisBits
description: Get your head in the game because we are about to have you rollin’ on the floor! MisBits drops you onto a sandbox stage where the rules are…there are no rules. A fun, frenetic and witty multiplayer action-adventure game for warriors, builders, thinkers, explorers and creators alike – essentially players of all ages and types.

name: Murder by Numbers
description:
Solve Pixel Puzzles to find clues. Use those clues to interrogate witnesses. Work your way to the truth...

...and uncover the mystery of Murder by Numbers!

name: Adventure Mosaics: Forest Spirits
description:
200 colorful nonograms for any difficulty, enchanting storyline and magical music, 
a wonderful combination to help you pass the time! Improve your puzzle skills by solving nonograms

name: Broomstick League
description: Equipped with a broomstick, a wand and nerves of steel, players must hone their flying skills and use magic to dodge enemies, defend their goal, and pull off incredible plays in Broomstick League. Soar high through the magical arenas as you try to outscore the competition and gain victory over your opponents.

name: Viking Chess: Hnefatafl
description: Play the ancient game of "Hnefatafl" in style on your PC, in Singleplayer mode against the AI or Multiplayer over the internet. "Hnefatafl" is a strategic, chess-like boardgame with assumed origins all the way back to the Viking era.

name: Boiling Steel
description: All people died and you are isolated. Your shelter has become a prison. On the planet of machines, no place for humanity, but it's still perfect place to revenge. You are a defensive combat protocol. Grow! Learn! Survive! Win!

name: The Longing
description: In utter loneliness, miles below the surface, it is your task to... wait. For 400 days... in real-time.

name: Wunderling
description:
Take control of the Wunderling, a low-level video game goon who has just unlocked the power to jump.

Unable to stop or change direction at will, you will need to plan ahead and master the Wunderlings’ abilities to navigate treacherous scrolling levels and chase down that pesky Hero...

name: Mystic Mansion
description: Unravel the mystery of the ruined mansion as you meet a cast of cute oddball characters and help them get their rooms back in shape!

name: Crystal Wish: Dwindle Hearts
description:
Three girls, a storm and a deck of cards.

Join Mughara, Meg and Rosalyn as they enjoy a game of Hearts to pass the time as a storm rages outside the hotel they are staying at.

Hey, don't you think the room is getting bigger?
It's called Dwindle Hearts for a reason after all~

name: Devil's Grip
description: Sin descripción

name: Tetris for Two
description: Minimalistic Tetris with several modes for two players

name: My Candy Love: Love Life
description:
Three years have passed since Candy graduated from Anteros Academy. Now owner and manager of the Cosy Bear Café, Candy will have to navigate her adult life with the help of her university sweetheart.

My Candy Love: Love Life is the third season of My Candy Love, which follows after the events of the previous season. It began on March 4th, 2020 and finished on November 10th, 2021, with a total of 15 episodes.

name: Slash & Girl: Endless Run
description: In a world which is invaded and controlled by Jokers, the story begins with a 'maniac' girl called Doris who fight alone with Jokers.

name: Betsy's Hospital
description: A small, surreal exploration game based on a memory of a children's hospital.

name: Skautfold: Moonless Knight
description: Skautfold: Moonless Knight is a very open-ended Metroidvania, featuring a totally unique battle system. Set in an alternate history Japan in 1900, Lovecraftian horrors have plagued the world, as our very Moon opens up and becomes our end.

name: Nasty Little Man
description:
He’s nasty, he’s little, and he’s got to go.

Reconstruct the cursed statue of a small, wretched man and banish his evil spirit forever. But beware—this diminutive scoundrel wants to cut you down to size.

Can you reconstruct his cursed effigy before his avatars morph you into their ranks?

name: Selfless Heroes
description:
Seize control of a team of selfless heroes sharing the same artificial intelligence. Design their AI and get them to work together to solve puzzles. Test your algorithm, optimize it, and emerge victorious from the dungeon! 
 
If you love logic and puzzles, you’ll love this challenging game. But there’s no need to be a programmer, just learn as you go, and discover the wonderful world of parallel programming, all to a background of soothing music. 
 
  ◼ 63 puzzles of increasing difficulty 
 
  ◼ 5 bosses to put your logic to the test 
 
  ◼ Over 30 hours of play 
 
  ◼ Learn to code like a real programmer 
 
  ◼ Already a programmer? Well, optimize your code and challenge yourself to achieve all the secondary objectives!

name: Pasvan
description: You can't get away from 'Gaman'!

name: Streamer Daily
description: Did you think it was easy to streaming? Do you think streamers earn money by playing games? Can you reach the summit by facing all the challenges of streaming? Then be a real streamer instead of playing this game !!!

name: Deep Space Banana
description: Send your ape armada out on a mission of conquest in space! Test your defense game skills as an outer space conqueror in this entertaining strategy game. Expand your space station and embark on exciting missions. Get started now!

name: Infestation: Battle Royale
description: Infestation: Battle Royale is a free-to-play, zombie-infested Battle Royale game. Fight in groups of 3 or solo until only one team remains standing. Discover a wide selection of maps, guns and customizations. Join in and let the good memories come back in this massively revamped all-time classic!

name: Rattus
description: Play as a Rattus, a psychic rat capable of summoning meteors and altering the fabric of time. He decides to fight some birds. Can you help him survive?

name: Granado Espada Japan
description: Sin descripción

name: The Fallen
description: A third person fantasy melee combat game. Play as a knight who awakens in The Land of the...

name: Inside the Computer
description: This is a game that takes place in computer hardware. It's about you fighting against computer viruses. I'm a 16-year-old senior high student. I love computer programming or making and playing computer games. This is a game that I made it all by myself. I hope you enjoy it.

name: Battle for Iwo Jima
description: Battle for Iwo Jima simulates the Invasion and desperate fighting for the island from Feb 19th 1945 to March 26th 1945. You take command of the US Marines and will test your ability to do better than those brave Marines did back in 1945.

name: Bombing Quest
description: Bombing Quest is a single player bomberman fantasy RPG, where the ancient machines of a civilization long gone, awaken you as the last protector of a mysterious ark. Dive deep into the mists, blasting your way through hordes of fierce foes and unravel the reason for your existence.

name: Floody
description: Floody is a vertically scrolling and horizontally screen wrapped party game. Build your own platforms to survive from the up-going flood or shoot other players fall into the flood. If you like this game, please tell your friends.

name: Baron: Fur is Gonna Fly
description: Thrilling aerial battles for up to 8 pilots in this local multiplayer action game. Choose a pilot, and let the battle begin. But wait! Your pilots are animals, and their biplanes are loaded with unusual weapons: flamethrowers, stinky fish, and more!

name: Infini
description: Integrating an outlandish narrative with rigorous mind-bending puzzles, Infini walks a fine line of meditative and chaotic. Standout visuals and concepts are used to create an imaginative and surrealist world where concepts like Poetry, War, Time, and Hope are personified. After being catapulted into Infinity by War, Hope must find his way back to the real world before it begins to suffer from his absence.

name: Ultimate Admiral: Age of Sail
description: Ultimate Admiral: Age of Sail is a tactical war-game from the creators of the Ultimate General series set amidst the epic naval campaigns in period of the American Revolutionary and Napoleonic Wars.

name: Hentai Thigh
description: Enjoy the beauty girls picture and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: Uniform Girl
description: This is a search for beautiful girls. Through the wiping of the gentlemen, the girls and girls interact to trigger the unlocking of all CG.

name: Brain Tester: Mind trick quiz
description:
This Game Is About Riddles and Mind Trick Questions .
Challenging Question that will trick your brain to get wrong answer.

Coming with 4(?) Choices of answers that will Help you beat the game

name: Brain Tester: Mind trick quiz
description: This game is about riddles and mind trick quiz with all the reason needed for each answer. Also a cute girl. :3 You will need all your brain power to clear this "Very fun" game Good luck, have fun and don't give up.

name: Castlevania: Symphony of the Night
description:
A port based on Castlevania: Symphony of the Night's expanded re-release for Castlevania: The Dracula X Chronicles.

Jump, dash and slash your way through Dracula’s vast castle as Alucard while encountering a unique array of enemies and characters along the way. Rediscover the world of Castlevania through one of its most iconic and groundbreaking games.

Unique to the mobile port is a new Continue function, allowing you to resume progress right in the room where you died. The pause-menu screen has also been completely redesigned for a modern aesthetic as well as touch-screen optimization and high-resolution artworks/backgrounds. Choose between using an external controller, or the default touchscreen controls which provide convenient on-screen button-shortcuts for spells and transformations. Unlock achievements with hard-fought battle milestones.

name: Shady Lewd Kart
description: Shady Lewd Kart takes go karting party games and mashes it with a dating sim to give you fast power sliding game play, sexy power-ups and lewd unlocks. The first ever Ecchi Kart game!

name: Piano Monsters
description:
Piano Monsters is a fun game and excellent musical exercise for ear improving. This is an unusual game with unique mechanics where you use your voice pitch to control monsters. They hear you and respond to your singing, humming or whistling.
Monsters adore to eat candy-notes. Help these cute creatures catch the notes.

name: Monster Energy Supercross: The Official Videogame 3 - Monster Energy Cup
description: Buy Monster Energy Supercross 3 - Monster Energy Cup now and enjoy the full experience of the most spectacular Supercross race ever!

name: Tom Clancy's The Division 2: Warlords of New York Edition
description:
INCLUDES THE DIVISION 2 + EXPANSION

In The Division 2, save a country on the brink of collapse as you explore an open, dynamic, and hostile world in Washington, DC. Fight together with your friends in online co-op or against others in competitive PvP modes.

In the Warlords of New York expansion, hunt down your nemesis, Aaron Keener, a former Division Agent who has taken control of New York. Trained by The Division but disavowing its ideals, he is now the highest authority in town.

name: Tom Clancy's The Division 2: Warlords of New York - Ultimate Edition
description:
In Tom Clancy's The Division 2, save a country on the brink of collapse as you explore an open, dynamic, and hostile world in Washington, DC. Fight together with your friends in online co-op or against others in competitive PvP modes.

Tom Clancy's The Division 2 Warlords of New York - Ultimate Edition includes:
- The base game
- The Warlords of New York expansion
- A level 30 boost, allowing you to jump right into the Warlords of New York campaign
- The instant unlock of all 6 endgame specializations
- 8 exclusive Classified assignments missions
- The Battleworn secret service pack
- The First Responder pack
- The Elite Agent pack
- 1 exclusive emote
- 1 exclusive outfit

name: Football: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade
description: You're the player and the manager of your moves on the field! It's a frenzy out there! Dash at sonic speed to the end zone and score as many touchdowns as possible!

name: Separation
description: Developed by solo indie game developer Recluse Industries, Separation is first person adventure at its most ambient and atmospheric. A meditation on solitude, loss, and the spiritual path, Separation is a unique journey to a place of epic desolation.

name: Serious Sam Collection
description: Step into the shoes of the legendary action hero Sam "Serious" Stone and experience one of the most explosive shooter game series of all time, as you save the world from a merciless alien invasion.

name: Cloud Meadow
description: Equal parts farming simulator, RPG, & visual novel- Cloud Meadow is an erotic game about learning to work with monstrous allies in order to build a new home and explore uncharted lands!

name: The Sims 4: Fun Outside Bundle
description: Includes The Sims 4 Island Living Pack, Perfect Patio, Backyard and Laundry Day Stuff Packs. Add a brand new world of Sulani and island living for new stories. Your Sims can also enjoy patio and backyard activities or even go outside for to do laundry!

name: Croissants
description:
Croissants is a story about a malfunctioning robot forced to work in a failing croissant-manufacturing factory.

Please help the robot to survive the workday as they are assailed by unfair work orders and a newly-awoken hunger than must be satiated by the very tools of their trade - Croissants.

name: Escape from Kabagahara
description:
You arrive at the forest clearing. Everything seems so calm, almost too quiet.

Will you enter Kabagahara's forest and unravel its mysteries?

You should be prepared.

name: Timeless Paradox VR
description: Our champion failed in her mission two years ago. Everything about this battle remains mysterious. Now you have the chance to go back. Will you change the history? Will you defy this fate with her?​ Your hearty VR journey Starts here!

name: Pirates? Pirates!
description: Pirates? Pirates! is a Reigns-inspired pirate survival RPG. You are a pirate captain in charge of your ship and crew on the most dangerous adventure of all seas. Fight your way ahead, sort out emergencies, and discover legendary treasures!

name: Holfraine
description: Be a part of the most powerful mercenaries of the universe and face your opponents in frenetic PvP online battles to achieve victory.

name: The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross
description: The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross - A cinematic anime game beyond your imagination!

name: Our Journeys 2 ~ A Collection of Visual Novels
description: "Our Journeys 2 ~ A Collection of Visual Novels" is a collection of four stories in various genres.

name: Lightale
description: Lightale, with the collocation of action game and visual novel game, 90+ stages and 100+ illustrations, Lightale will bring you a great experience to enjoy the story. Use your wisdom to solve the mystery behind and unfold the truth of the story; Use your creative to create your battle strategy and overcome the battle.

name: Krew.io
description:
Krew.io is a unique multiplayer 3D third-person shooter web-based game. Included within the io games category, but vastly different compared to most of its competition, Krew boasts an overall pirate theme where players compete to sink each other, race for loot, and attempt to be a successful pirate.

The game is mostly competitive, as players battle each other for #1 on the in-game leaderboard, but is also somewhat cooperative, as players on the same ship will have to work together to sink enemies and pilot the craft.

name: Snoopy Puzzle Journey
description:
Join one of the most famous animated dogs in history in SNOOPY Puzzle Journey. In this classic match-3 game you travel the globe with well-known characters, clearing colorful pieces in each round and banking the points you need to visit every corner of the planet.

SNOOPY Puzzle Journey has rich colorful graphics and features many of the series’ most beloved faces. As you move through the levels you’ll encounter more and more colored pieces. Just connect three of the same color to eliminate rows and columns and advance onto the harder challenges.

Every time you complete a puzzle you zoom off to another different country. Fancy a trip to France? Or Italy? Just win each round to keep traveling! Also, there’s no need to move any of the pieces you find – simply tap the groups of matching colors and watch the points roll in!

With SNOOPY Puzzle Journey you’ll be able to travel the globe with your loyal dog companion designed by Charles M. Schulz. Have hours of fun completing puzzles and learning a little more about the world’s geography in the process.

Service ended on July, 31, 2022.

name: Space Redemption
description: Space Redemption is a 2D shooter in which the protagonist is assigned the role of the savior of mankind!

name: Fighting Clans
description: A true, FIRST VR Street Fight! You’re just a regular guy, doing your best to get by, but you made your choices and now you’re in debt to the mafia. The only way you are going to save yourself is to fight. Prepare to engage in combat with no limits, no rules. You fight to win, you win to survive.

name: Vaporwave World
description: "Vaporwave World" is a simple and casual buiding game that currently has two art packs (Egypt, 1980s). You can customize the lights in the game, and you will automatically get various types of buiding items over time.

name: Comrade-in-Arms
description: Comrade-in-Arms is a Top-Down 2D Arcade-Style Retro Shooter, where the aim of the game is to fight through the waves of enemies to eventually slaughter the boss at the end.

name: Solo King: Single Player - Texas Hold'em Poker
description: SoloKing Poker - AI coaching and training poker software. Poker training complex tools: Poker Hand Evaluator, Showdown Calculator, Table Simulation, Equity Evaluator,Draw Evaluator, EV Evaluator, Advisor Coach. The Strongest Poker AI Opponents. No-Limit ring games, MTTs, heads-up tournaments.

name: My Town: Dessert Slice
description: It’s a party time. Slice hundreds of various donuts and climb to the top of leaderboard. Slice as many as you can and utilize the magic item to clear the flying donuts. Avoid any incoming bombs to get the highest rank!

name: Nocturne: Prelude
description: The afterlife is now digital. Discover that eternal life comes with sacrifice in the first chapter of a genre-defying RPG with unique rhythm combat.

name: Tom Clancy's The Division 2: Warlords of New York
description: The Division 2: Warlords of New York expansion will take you to Lower Manhattan, New York City in the hunt for Aaron Keener and his posse of rogue agents. The expansion was created with three main goals in mind, expand the narrative of The Division 2, strive to incorporate community feedback and the creation of a cohesive end-game experience.

name: Of Evil and Darkness
description: A group of paranormal investigators with their own television show head to a remote island to film an episode. Once there they encounter the evil that was let loose upon the island, long ago.

name: Hypergalactic Psychic Table Tennis 3000
description: Paddle your balls! The hypergalaxy's premiere video table tennis role playing experience. Explore the hypergalaxies in the year 3000 or so to become the ultimate paddle champion. Learn new skills, cast devastating spells and put someone's underwear on your head whist riding a swamp beast!

name: Street Sweeper
description: Clean up the streets like they were meant to be swept. Midnight or dusk, in big cities and isolated boroughs, the Street Sweeper vacuums on. It's you versus yesterday's filth - and the clock! - in this single-player procedurally generated arcade experience.

name: The Sperminator: Rescuing Tzar Vlad
description: Be a Hero Super soldier Sperminator, beat evil Trumpster and Save Iconic Tzar Vlad

name: The Political Machine 2020
description: Win the hearts and minds of America's voters and take the 2020 presidential election by storm in Stardock's popular political strategy game. Choose a candidate and run against a computer opponent or a candidate controlled by another person over the Internet.

name: Deathbloom: Chapter 2
description: Inspired by classic survival horror. Bachman Manor sprawls into a maze of corridors, bedrooms, foyers, and more. Filled with puzzles, traps, and hidden passageways that explore the secrets of its dark history and occupants.

name: The Adventures of Looppy
description: Immerse yourself in the magical world of adventure and puzzles with Looppy!

name: Puddle Knights
description: A mud-based puzzle game where you use the lengthy capes of chivalrous knights to cover puddles and help members of the upper class away from badly sanitized streets. Solve your way through increasingly tricky puzzles in this lighthearted medieval mindmuck!

name: Motorsport Manager Racing
description:
Motorsport Manager Racing, the acclaimed race team strategy game is now multiplayer.
Create your very own motorsport team by hiring drivers and designing car parts, then compete against real managers from around the world in simultaneous 10 person multiplayer races.
Can you make it to the World Motorsport Championship, where the top players compete every week to be the best Motorsport Manager in the world?
Some of the world’s top drivers (including Jean Eric Vergne and Sebastian Buemi) and legendary motorsport brands (such as Porsche, Mercedes and Audi) are available for the very first time in a Motorsport Manager game!

name: Star Souls
description: Star Souls is a game about a galactic cataclysm. One by one, the stars began to die without reason. Thousands of inhabited worlds turned to dust. You should find a Transition leading to other worlds. Vanguard the fleet, customize your spaceships and fight for salvation of all intelligent life!

name: Infiltria
description: Infiltria is rogue-lite rpg survival shooter, with procedurally generated levels and character persistent progression. Including talents, power-up, traits and unique character abilities brings you highly re-playable content.

name: MechDefender
description: In this unique top-down shooter tower defense hybrid you pilot a Mech to defend your home from zombies. Wipe out hordes of undead creatures from outer space using powerful weapons and clever tactics. Build labyrinth, upgrade your skills, buy new weapons to destroy them all and save your base.

name: Samus Goes to the Fridge to Get a Glass of Milk
description: Help Samus get a glass of milk for Adam at 2 AM.

name: Bear, Vodka, Stalingrad!
description: This time, Motherland sent you to fight vs Nazi forces in the ruins of the snowy Stalingrad. Kill enemies and conquer trophy weapons to get the maximum chance to survive.

name: Chess Sudoku
description:
Chess Sudoku takes the classic sudoku game everyone knows and loves and creates 3 different puzzles with chess-related twists!

In Knight Sudoku, in addition to the normal rules of sudoku, a digit must not appear a chess knight's move away from itself. King Sudoku and Queen Sudoku work the same way with a few differences. In King Sudoku a digit must not be a single diagonal move away from itself. In Queen Sudoku, every 9 in the grid acts like a chess Queen and must not be in the same row/column/3x3 box or diagonal of any other 9.

name: Blood Relation Part1.
description: Proceed with tools, notes, etc. in a closed building. Overcome various fears and complete tasks. Unlock secrets hidden in the building.

name: Crate Punks: Dada is Dead
description: The new Crate Punks: Dada is Dead release is a ground-up remake of the titular 2016 crate-throwing battle game. A clever game of crate action chess, perfect for sharing a couch with your friends. Each arena is made of 100% crates, which means anything you can stand on can and will be used as a weapon.

name: Spacewalk Defender
description: Dual-wield high tech weapons to fight off endless and increasingly difficult waves of enemies in this sci-fi VR shooter. Give it your best in an attempt to climb the leaderboards by reaching the highest score out of all players.

name: Amoeba Battle: Microscopic RTS Action
description:
Amoeba Battle is a new breed of real-time strategy game where you control versatile amoebas in the battle for the microscopic world.
Unlike other RTS games, there are no bases to build - new amoebas are created through the miracle of binary fission!

name: Go or Leave
description: Danmaku Interaction Game.

name: Economica
description: Experiment with the economy, win the crisis

name: Vigil of Glory - Part I
description: Are you even to yourself? Become who you are!

name: Cube Course
description: A simple, yet fun 2D platformer. Get from point A to point B without hitting a spike and dying. Collect coins along the way to unlock features that change the atmosphere, difficulty and feeling of the game. If you like those old games that aren't to complicated and complex, you'll love this.

name: Chronostation
description: Sci-fi Tower Defense real-time strategy with pleasant adaptive music. Play as a commander of a space station which got stuck in a time anomaly.

name: Send them to the sky
description: Use your magic cell keeping those funny villagers in the sky and don't let them down!

name: Unnamed
description: You - an Unnamed suicide with a question mark instead of a face. But it looks like dying won't be so easy.

name: Dead Shits
description: Dead Shits is a cartoony platformer with traps, enemies and time pressure in fantasy worlds. Some levels can be destroyed, so be careful!

name: Ninjapple
description: Ninjapple is a crazy 2D platformer in which you need to collect the five elemental medalions to bring peace back to the world ! Take part in this adventure throughout many levels !

name: T.A.R.S
description: It is the year 2051, a disease has swept across the planet infecting over 90% of the population. You will take on the role of Samantha in this 3rd person horror shooter. Can you survive?

name: Isle of Ewe
description: Embark on an adventure and command your flock to bring your fluffy friends back home. The mysterious disappearance of Ramsey sparks your journey as you must collect, throw and bounce from sheep to sheep to bring him back home safely.

name: Kubble Star
description: Destroy all the cubes! Use the laser to launch your cubes and match your colors by 3 or more, to remove all cubes from the level to move to the next level.

name: Into the Valley
description: A single player third person detective adventure RPG set in ancient Egypt. While the game is primarily a quest game in which you have to follow clues to find your daughter who has been kidnapped by slave traders, it does contain elements of combat and exploration.

name: FadeZone
description: The world is gradually destroying...The Savior is fighting alone...The distorted behaviour of the Savior...Made people living in hell...At this time...A Hero who could not speak appeared in the world...He has the right to save this world...Save the Savior, and the world...

name: Kill the Ice Age Baby Adventure The Game
description: A first person 3D adventure game

name: Stabfish.io
description: Stabfish.io is a free io game where you play as a deadly oceanic beast. Join a multiplayer arena of fish equipped with fatal tusks and take down your share of prey while avoiding the sharp end of another player’s stabber. Collect the fish like trophies, eat food for boosts, and dominate the sea.

name: Arkanoid: Amiga Alternate Levels
description: This is a conversion of the 32 levels created exclusively for the Commodore Amiga version of Arkanoid, adapted into the NES port of the original.

name: Johnny Trigger: Avenger DLC
description:
Move into action and let your enemies taste the power of Hurricane gun!
Customize your appearance with Avenger skin and pick up a new unique weapon now!

This DLC unlocks the Avenger skin and the unique weapon Hurricane.
On the Nintendo Switch this pack also includes 35000 money (to buy or draw weapons and skins in shops) and 1500 gems to buy other currencies.

name: Johnny Trigger: Butcher DLC
description:
Move into action and let your enemies taste the power of Vengeance gun!
Customize your appearance with Butcher skin and pick up a new unique weapon now!

This DLC unlocks the Butcher skin and the unique weapon Vengeance.
On the Nintendo Switch this pack also includes 15 keys to open locked doors in base and 50 hammers to unlock another upgrades in base

name: Johnny Trigger: Lunatic DLC
description:
Move into action and let your enemies taste the power of Showtime gun!
Customize your appearance with Lunatic skin and pick up a new unique weapon now!

This DLC unlocks the Lunatic skin and the unique weapon Showtime.
On the Nintendo Switch this pack also includes 3000 gems (to buy other currencies) and 75 additional puzzles to unlock more comic graphics.

name: Therapy for Orchestra Movement III
description: Instruments do have a soul, and we should nourish that.

name: Durandal
description: A companion visual novel for Honkai Impact 3rd. Stars a younger Durandal and Rita Rossweisse on their mission in the Sea of Quanta to investigate a bubble universe.

name: Crelabeth: Unholy Lands
description: Explore, fight, survive and unravel mysteries in this unique and unforgiving 2D isometric RPG set in an original dark, high fantasy world. Crelabeth's exceptional attention to detail and realistic simulation of all things aim to provide a deeply immersive and dynamic gameplay experience.

name: Noesis
description: From behind the incidents, there hide the secret of the past.

name: Morinaga Pac-Man mini
description:
Morinaga Pac-Man mini is an online game first published in March of 2020. Released by Morinaga, it promotes their "Hi-Chew Mini" and "Caramel Mini" candies. While defunct, this game is still fully playable via the Internet Archive.

The Hi-Chew and Caramel Mini candies encouraged "flavor mixing" by eating two specific flavors at once, forming a "new" flavor when combined. The game is adapted from the arcade original, though the Power Pellets are replaced with the respective candies; the Ghosts will turn into the actual candy flavors formed by mixing.

There are both "Normal" and "Special" game modes. In a standard game, the maze would be randomly selected to be either a Hi-Chew or Caramel maze. In the special game, the two mazes appear side-by-side, both being played at once. The special game was accessed via the UPC code on an actual candy box; this can still be played today by entering a known code, 166 and 001.

name: Yu Crossing Animals
description: Yu's got a new job - working as a mayor's assistant in a small town.

name: Doom II: Deltarune Companions - Susie and Ralsei
description:
These companion characters come from Deltaruneland and they're
here to aid you in slaying demons or just to accompany you along
in whatever journey you might take!

name: Invercity
description: Invercity is a puzzle-platformer that features Handstand. Handstand looks like hanging when you look it upside down, doesn't it? This game really makes it look that way. A reporter who loves handstand follow the mystery while reporting the "Handstand Phenomenon" in the city.

name: Fallen London: Shades of Yesterday
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for March, 2020. The first entry in the Season of Endeavours.

name: Nations At War Digital: White Star Rising Battlepack 1
description: White Star Rising Battlepack 1 includes 9 Scenarios focusing on the fighting between the Americans, their British allies, and Germans, Unit types include vehicles, soldiers, and weapons of the armies that fought in France, Belgium, and Germany in 1944-45.

name: Word Farm Adventure
description:
Save the farm animals on this FREE word scrabble puzzle game!

In our new challenging and super fun word game for adults and kids, you will word-swipe your way into becoming the beloved hero of the farm.

Word Farm Adventure is not just about solving cross word puzzles - it's also about enjoying a great story while fighting the evil forces that want to destroy the farm.

You also get to fix, build, paint and design your farm!

So let’s get going - the animals need you at your best!

name: Quest Arrest
description:
A detective RPG released for the Game Boy in 2020.

The game follows the main protagonist, recently promoted, Detective Allison Bennett on her quest for clean up her city, Strange Meadows, after the recent crime spree that has thrown the city into chaos. Athena, and her gang, has been terrorizing the residents and has set her sights on taking over the city for herself.

name: Deep Forest
description: Something seems odd when you can't find your faithful friend Squee in the morning. The forest is ill and you'll need your squirrel friend's help to save the animal spirits. Use your witchy powers to discover the true cause of this turmoil and save the forest from its nightmare.

name: Nines
description:
This casual game is very simple but addictive.

All you have to do is just Quickly touch 1 to 9 or 9 to 1 in sequence.
But pay attention to the direction of the numbers when touching 6 or 9.

name: Sticky Terms
description: Puzzle through this and 149 other words that have no equivalent in other languages.

name: Lost Expeditions: Station One
description: It all starts with a meteor crash, where an unknown alien substance starts spreading, thriving in a thick fog. Humanity sends in countless explorers, but none return. You, of course, are one of them. Repair a defunct radio tower, establish connection with the outside world and survive.

name: Entertainment Hero 2
description: Training's Over, Hero! Conquer Eleven Stages Full of Unique Enemies and Obstacles! Confront All Nine Exciting Boss Battles Leading to the Final Boss! Find Secret Power-Ups and Additional Weapons to Help You on Your Way!

name: Tinker Racers
description: Tinker Racers is a survival racing party game. Drive mini RC cars through tracks built around the house with common, everyday items. Forget the finishing line and just try to stay in sight! Up to four friends can join forces or compete with each other on local multiplayer!

name: Christmas Cats Revenge
description: Christmas Cats Revenge is a Christmas themed 2D Platform Action game based on the story of the war which broke out between Kim Cats and Kon Cats Kingdoms.

name: They Are Beasts
description: They Are Beasts is a third-person shooter in which you will fight an army of undead, led by the most vile creatures of darkness, and wrest your soul from the demon's tenacious claws. Do not forget to recharge!

name: Subtyrannya - A story-driven merchant game
description:
Greetings fellow citizens of the underground,

this is Subtyrannya, a dystopian merchant simulator with lovecraftian vibes, mystery and a whole lot of secrets for you to discover.

You play as a lone merchant with his vehicle, driving trough the apocalyptic underground on the search for wealth, knowledge and one or two other things.

On your journey you will travel to many different cities, each with their own weird gimmicks, situations and happenings. Every time it is your own decision if you want to indulge into the secrets or just stay for a brief moment for a trade and a chat. But be warned. If you decide to dig deeper, you may have to make difficult decisions that not only affect you, but the possibly the whole underground!

name: Stackems
description: Score the highest in solo play or with up to three other players in this new take on an old classic.

name: Deadly Station
description: Discover thet dark story of this abandoned town and its inhabitants.

name: Open Heart: Second Year
description: Open Heart: Second Year is the second book of the Open Heart series. It is alternatively known as Open Heart, Book 2. It succeeds its first book, Open Heart, Book 1 and is followed by Open Heart: Third Year.

name: Awaken Alone
description:
This original adventure game is a “tip of the cap” to the point and click games of the early 90’s. Adventure game fans will enjoy the classic point and click experience, and the most perceptive players can also experience zen inspired philosophy woven subliminally through the dialogue and puzzles.

Only you can find the missing crew and answer the question of what happened on the Artemis Agroterra III. Solve puzzles to explore the ship, and figure out why you never made it home. Did 'Lunar Corp.' set the crew up to fail or did something else happen in the far flung reaches of the Milky Way? Piece together the clues and find out how you came to be the sole survivor aboard the floating enigma of the 'Agroterra III' in Awaken Alone.

name: SCP 3008
description: A game based on the SCP universe. You will have to listen to the sounds and react correctly to the situation in order to survive in the dangerous SCP shopping center!

name: Trying to Sing in Static
description:
Ferry stranded silhouettes across a dead sea

A small atmospheric game that takes around 25 minutes to complete

name: Brine Flow
description:
Fish him out and make HIM whole again!

Made for #FishingHorrorJam

name: FTL: Multiverse
description: FTL: Multiverse is a massive overhaul mod for the game FTL: Faster Than Light. It adds nearly 200 new playable ships, over 500 new enemy vessels, over 200 new weapons and drones, and over 30 brand new sectors to explore!

name: H.E.L.P.: The Heroes Enhancing Lives Program
description: The Heroes Enhancing Lives Program (HELP) is now hiring for new talent! Are you a team player who works hard, can handle challenging situations, and questions the status quo? This fulfilling position is located at the peaceful hamlet where you can enjoy homely, local cuisine or take a breather at the nearby forest path.

name: Hatsune Miku Logic Paint
description: Hatsune Miku puzzle game is here! Includes difficulty levels from LV1 to LV3 and special stages! When you clear the stage, you will get illustrations of Hatsune Miku!

name: Fisherman's Peril
description: You are a fisherman who wants to lay claim to the mighty treasures of earth's oceans. but the fish will not give up their loot and their lives without a fight.

name: Lunch Hero
description:
Lunch Hero is your dangerous bite-sized journey through the mysterious worlds of enchanted forests, ominous dungeons, and ancient fortresses. Wherever you go, you’ll confront countless hordes of monsters ready to fall victims to your power. 
Pick up a staff to release fiery fireballs and ice bolts when you need them, or grab a crossbow to hit a bull's eye to turn the tide of battle.

name: In Her Footsteps
description: In Her Footsteps is a short story about mending a broken heart from the award-nominated creators of Causeway, No Response and Helmouth Halls

name: Darkness Trap: Purify Old Sins
description:
Do you love video games and eventually have a powerful iPhone/iPad? Darkness Trap is just for you, a real gamer who wants to play everywhere, so here is your new challenging game. 
 
Great video games are not made in a night, specially for iOS, imagine being alone in a cursed town, with a lot of monsters with your arsenal of weapons and magics! That is what Darkness Trap is about. 
 
Darkness Trap: Purify Old Sins tells the story of a misled and trapped girl in a cursed town full of different monsters with no help, you are the only one who can help her. In this dark and atmospheric game you will meet multiple types of enemies as well as many weapons to kill monsters. Do you like magics? So you may hit enemies with magic, use magic to protect yourself and also enlighten your way out! 
 
This game features an atmospheric dark inter-connected environment, inspired by Souls-borne games and also 3D side-scrolling camera with ability to move in every direction. If you have a PS4 or XBOX controller you can also use it to play this game on iOS/iPadOS 13 or above. 
 
So what are you waiting for? Buy the game now and enjoy it!

name: Fishing Vacation
description: Made for the Fishing Horror Jam 2020 over the course of a month.

name: Mossland
description: A story about a bug in a bottle.

name: Madrun
description:
Tired of uneventful, single-player 2D platformers? 
 
This just another one of them...except you race against up to 7 other players online and create catastrophic chaos with items beyond insanity.

name: King of Vikings
description: King of Vikings is an adventure visual novel set in a Viking fantasy land. You play as a Viking noble summoned by Queen Mathilde to defeat a tentacled menace by assembling an elite unit of warriors.

name: Euler Wars
description: Test your flying and design abilities in this challenging 3D space arcade shooter.

name: Zombie Variant
description: A first person, zombie shooter.

name: Legendary Knight
description: The enemy is invading our territory, and the king leads his men to resist. The king takes on the responsibility of defending his homeland. Vowing to expel tons of enemy forces away from our country, and guard the sacred statues that symbolize our ruling power.

name: Strip 4: Classmate Study
description: A girl from school has invited you to study for exams. She is bored and asking you to play.

name: The House in the Forest
description: The House in the Forest is a short, first-person exploration game about a family who moved out to go live a lonely life. You'll play as a person who got lost on the way back to his house ends up discovering clean but an abandoned house.

name: Mechanica
description:
Mechanica is an open-world survival game with a heavy focus on building and programming. Create your own bases, defenses, manufacturing systems and more. Explore the map and expand the scope and complexity of your creations.

Step into a open-world, post-apocalyptic map populated by menacing robots. Establish your first base and begin automating.

Improve your defenses with a range of devices to keep the increasingly hostile robots at bay. Create farms and water pumps to keep yourself fed and hydrated. Try your best to remain alive in this hostile world.

Use the visual programming system to make objects interact in any way you wish. Make a tripwire trigger a flamethrower, use a button to instantly put your base in lockdown, control your mining outpost from across the map - anything is possible in Mechanica.

Key Features
- Build your own bases or fortify preexisting locations
- Set up advanced defenses to fend off robots
- Establish automated manufacturing systems to produce items for you
- Build farms and water pumps to keep yourself fed and hydrated

name: Frog X Log
description: In Frog X Log, you must catch as many fly's as possible with your abnormally long tongue until a inevitable fatal mistake. Each Fly is colour coded and in turn, must be caught with the right colour of tongue. One out of three colours is picked every 30 seconds which triggers a tongue colour change, for every 10 Fly's picked, the difficulty spikes along with a few surprises. However, if you happen to catch a fly with the wrong colour, you will trigger a game over and a potential froggy explosion. Simplistic controls are all that are required, arrow keys to move and the space-bar to temporarily freeze and stick out your tongue.

name: Knights of Light: The Prologue
description: Action adventure role playing game during medieval age in Middle East. Story is based on a historical battle at the 7th century in Iraq. Inspired by The Witcher and Mount & Blade with a rich story with two playable characters. Relive the battle events and lead your troops to victory.

name: Followed by Death
description: You escape the unimaginable horror and find yourself in The Old Harman's Castle. You must find Francis Harman, the castle owner, to find out what's after you.

name: The Frozen Shore
description: Harry lives a simple life. Every morning he wakes up and takes his little boat out fishing. This morning however, he awakens to find that the whole coastline has been covered in snow! Will he still be able to take his boat out of the harbour for his daily fishing trip?

name: Overly Qualified Ms. Mary
